<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[71, 89, 547, 103]]<|/det|>
(a) On a horizontal section of the road, the power of the lorry's engine is constant. There is a constant resistance to motion of 1600 N .

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 127, 547, 142]]<|/det|>
(i) The steady speed which the lorry can maintain with the engine working at power \(P \mathrm{~W}\) is \(30 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 164, 210, 177]]<|/det|>
Find the value of \(P\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[90, 342, 547, 359]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 368, 336, 382]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[71, 546, 547, 563]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 574, 489, 588]]<|/det|>
lorry's speed as it ascends the hill. The constant resistance to motion remains 1600 N .

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 598, 187, 611]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[71, 251, 547, 266]]<|/det|>
